187745.content:
Dragi prijatelji drustvenih igri, jeste li zainteresirani za igranje 22.5, odnosno 23.5?

Imamo neke nove igre, izmedu ostalog i jednu koja traje malo duze :D

Rijec je o Arkham Horror, tipicno se igra 2-3 sata, no i objasnjavanje pravila traje nekih pola sata. Ideja je bila da svi koji zele igrati doma pogledaju pravila (linkat cu dobar video kasnije) i onda mozemo odmah krenuti igrati. Takoder, igra se u maksimalno 6 igraca, pa ono, tko se prvi javi njegovo :D

Za ostale koji nisu zainteresirani za tu igru ili se prekasno jave, bez brige bit ce i drugih igri (izmedu ostalog i kittensi) pa dodite either way!

187808.content:
@Emma63194#187763 ja imam i laganih i teskih, evo neki overview pa mozete replyati sto vam se igra:

first contact (2-7): tipa codenames, 1h playtime, low complexity

spirit island + ekspanzija (1-6): strategy game, 1-2h playtime, medium/high complexity

richoche robots (1-inf): puzzle game, 30min playtime, low-medium complexity

don't mess with cthulhu (3-8): deception game ala mafia/amongus, 45min playtime, low complexity

the crew (3-6): trick taking game (slicno kao hanabi), 15min playtime, medium complexity

high society (3-5): bidding game, 30min playtime, low complexity

nidavellir (2-4): deck building game, 1h playtime, medium complexity

root (2-4): war game, 1h playtime, medium-high complexity

camel up (3-8): luck/bidding game, 45min playtime, low complexity

kakerlaken poker (3-8): isto kao bullshit\seres, 20min playtime, low complexity

carcassonne (2-4): puzzle/board control game, 1h playtime, low complexity

awkward guests (1-8): deduction game, 45min playtime, low complexity

tichu (4): trick taking game, 20min gameplay, medium complexity

the game (1-6): tipa hanabi, 20min gameplay, medium complexity

the hive (2): laksi sah, 20min gameplay, medium complexity

azul (2-4): abstract puzzle game, 45min gameplay, low complexity

wavelength (2-inf): party game, 10min gameplay, low complexity

Meni su najdraze spirit island i root, ali su i najteze pa ne znam koliko bi ih preporucila novim/casual igracima. Ali ni s ostalima necete pogrijesiti.
